Detailed Description

helper utilities for the Talkers

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum FieldType
 

Enumeration values:
FIELD_WHITEPAGES  "what" is name or phone number
FIELD_YELLOWPAGES_WITH_CATEGORY  "what" with category name
FIELD_YELLOWPAGES  "what" without category name included

MC2String getWhatField (  const ExternalSearchRequestData &  data,
FieldType  type,
bool  urlEncode = false
) 
 

Returns the "what" filed to use in the search.

The "what" filed is dependent on the provider

Parameters:
data is the request data
type the type of the field. Used the decide what data to put in the what field.
urlEncode controls if the returned string should be URLEncoded The default value is false.
Returns:
A string to use as "what" in the query.

uint32 maxCount (  uint32  start,
uint32  end,
uint32  replyHits,
uint32  estimatedResultCount,
uint32  lastOffset,
uint32  pageSize
) 
 

Determines maximum number of hits to receive from a request.

Parameters:
start Start offset of the request.
end End offset of the request.
replyHits Number of hits between start and end offset.
estimatedResultCount The estimated maximum number of results one could receive from this request.
lastOffset The offset maximum of a request.
pageSize Number of maximum hits per page.

bool  ignoreInitialXML = false

Parses a xml string source and returns xml parsers instance.

Parameters:
url the original url
xmlSource the source to be parsed
ignoreInitialXML Whether or not to ignore the <?xml tag
Returns:
pointer to DOM parser
